original_text: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
korean_text: 그들이 하는 일과 그들의 행위가 악한 대로 갚으시며 그들의 손이 지은 대로 그들에게 갚아 그 마땅히 받을 것으로 그들에게 갚으소서

sentences.original_text: Give them according to their deeds
and according to the wickedness of their endeavours
give them after the work of their hands
